import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { BiMenu, BiX } from "react-icons/bi"; import {Button} from '../../Globalstyles'; import { FooterSection, FoterSection, FooterContainer, FooterNewsletter, FooterNewsletterTitle, FooterNewsletterText, FooterNewsletterForm, FooterNewsletterInput, FooterBtn, FooterLinkContainer, FooterLinksWrapper, FooterLinks, FooterLinkTitle, FooterLink, FooterCopyRight, NavLogo, MenuIcon, WorksCardContent, Imgw, WorksCard, FoterContainer, FooterLabel } from './Footer.styles'; import LC from '../../images/LC.jpg'; import LN from '../../images/LN.jpg'; const Footer = () => { const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const [button, setButton] = useState(true); const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); const closeMenu = () => setClick(false); const showButton = () =>{ if(window.innerWidth<= 1000){ setButton(false); }else{ setButton(true); } } useEffect(() => { showButton(); }, []); window.addEventListener('resize', showButton); return (
{click ? : } {click ? : } {click ? : } {click ? : } {click ? : } {click ? : } {click ? : } {click ? : } {click ? : } {click ? : } INSTITUTO EDUCATIVO NUEVA GRANADA CALLE 33 SUR NO 24-48 TEL:8642992 pagina realizada por jhon soledad y sara rojas
) } export default Footer;
